long_description: Designed for cycling, with reflective trim, a droptail hem and removable hood, the men's Merrell Catalyst Shell Jacket is also right at home on walks to the park or visits to the pub. 100% polyester fabric has a durable water repellent finish to shed light precipitation. No-stick sleeves have a hybrid mesh lining to prevent clinging and clamminess. Commuter-friendly reflective piping on back hem, cuffs and hood brim increases your visibility in low light. Hood also offers reflectivity in back when worn down with a helmet. Water-resistant zippered pockets; snap-close chest pockets. High standing collar protects face from wind and weather. The Merrell Catalyst Shell Jacket for men features an adjustable hem and a center storm flap to seal out weather.
short_description: Designed for cycling, with reflective trim, a droptail hem and removable hood, the men's Merrell Catalyst Shell Jacket is also right at home on walks to the park or visits to the pub.
